title: Practice-Based Online Learning Design Workshop: Developing Instructional Strategies for STEM Education Application

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Course Applying Instructional Design Theory and Practical Tools to Develop Real STEM Education Modules. Strengthening Field Applicability Through Learning Design Framework Analysis and Design Case Studies

learning_goals: Learners can develop one STEM-focused online educational module within four weeks using a practice-based design framework
Learners can analyze and improve constraints in learning environments by applying the Theory of Practice Architectures (TPA) approach
Learners can revise and enhance learning design plans at least twice based on formative assessment data
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
